member.name: T:NAnt.NUnit2.Tasks.NUnit2Task
member.summary: Runs tests using the NUnit V2.1 framework.

remarks.para: See the NUnit home page for more information.
The or attributes are only used when more than one test suite is used. If any test suite fails, a build error will be thrown. Set to to ignore test errors and continue the build.
In order to run a test assembly built with NUnit 2.0 using the NAnt , you must add the following node to your test config file :
remarks.code: <configuration> ... <runtime> <assemblyBinding xmlns="urn:schemas-microsoft-com:asm.v1"> <dependentAssembly> <assemblyIdentity name="nunit.framework" publicKeyToken="96d09a1eb7f44a77" culture="Neutral" /> <bindingRedirect oldVersion="2.0.6.0" newVersion="2.1.4.0" /> </dependentAssembly> </assemblyBinding> </runtime> ... </configuration>

example.para: Run tests in the MyProject.Tests.dll assembly.
Run all tests in files listed in the tests.txt file.
